description:
Panic in the city due to the "Handstand Phenomenon" in which objects fall into the sky!
A reporter who loves handstand is chosen to cover the event.
 While covering various parts of the city, she tries to find out the mystery behind the "Handstand Phenomenon"!

 Invercity is a puzzle-platformer that features "Handstand".
 The game has two important mechanics: "Handstand" and "Inverted Broadcast".

・Handstand
The protagonist, Urara can always do a “Handstand”.
When she does, a strange phenomenon occurs. Various objects “fall from the sky”。
According to Urara,”Because that’s how things seem to me. Isn’t it normal?”.

・Inverted Broadcast
When the “Inverted Broadcast Switch” is pressed on the stage, an inverted signal is transmitted to the broadcasting room, which causes the world to be inverted.
When the world is inverted, your “handstand” will look like your “hanging”, and you can visit places you could not go to before.
name: Invercity
